summary: Diff shows changes to backend/main.mo plus several frontend hooks/components. Evidence indicates some work on React Query caching (including a stated fix to useMoveFilesToMission to source files from any folder cache), but the provided diff summary does not clearly show complete implementation of immediate UI updates/rollback for both files and notes, nor the backend detachment guarantees. Several unrelated UI/features (e.g., speech-to-text and upload behavior changes) appear to have been introduced despite scope constraints.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure moved files/links from a folder are removed from the source folder list immediately and appear in the target mission immediately, working from any folder cache, with rollback on failure.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary only asserts (in a file summary) that useMoveFilesToMission sources files from any folder cache; it does not provide concrete evidence of (a) updating both source folder cache and target mission cache immediately, and (b) rollback behavior on failed move.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure moved notes from a folder are removed from the source folder notes list immediately and appear in the target mission notes list immediately, with rollback on failure.
missing_requirements.reason: No move-notes-to-mission hook or optimistic cache update/rollback logic is shown. The visible changes in useNotesQueries focus on fetching and note creation invalidation, not moving notes between folder and mission caches.

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend move-to-mission operations must clear folderId and set missionId for moved files/links and notes (and update location/fileLocation consistently if used), so folder-scoped queries stop returning them and mission-scoped queries start returning them.
missing_requirements.reason: backend/main.mo is truncated and does not show any move-to-mission method implementation or changes that demonstrate folderId clearing / missionId setting for files/links/notes or query behavior changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Added speech-to-text microphone dictation support in the Add Note form.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by any REQ; violates constraint to avoid other application changes beyond the move bugfix.

hallucinated_features.description: Changes to upload/progress behavior (unified progress bar integration for uploads/links/notes; ExternalBlob.withUploadProgress usage).
hallucinated_features.reason: Explicit non-goal/constraint: do not change upload/progress-bar behavior; request is only about moving items from folders to missions.

hallucinated_features.description: Broad React Query behavior changes (increased staleTime/gcTime, refetch behavior, concurrency limiter usage for notes) beyond move-to-mission flow.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; scope constraint says no other changes beyond fixing incorrect/non-immediate transfer.
